Content.Text: <MYNAME>, are you here? I'm coming in.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry for calling on you so early in the
morning. As it turns out, I have to go
back to my homeland for a while.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm a prince, after all. I need to
make reports and resolve a number
of issues at home.
<PAGE>
I won't be back for a while. I should
think it will be winter time before I
can get away.
<PAGE>
I'm taking this trip alone, so if you
need anything, you can still contact
Sanjay. I'll see you later in the year.
